title: Social Distortion - Social Distortion 1990 ak320
description:
Social Distortion - Social Distortion 1990 ak320

Social Distortion is an American punk rock band formed in 1978 in Fullerton, California.
Social Distortion rose to fame with this 1990 self-titled third album, which produced their well-known hit singles "Ball and Chain", "Story of My Life", and the cover of Johnny Cash's "Ring of Fire", and was certified gold by RIAA. Many of their later albums, including their second gold record Somewhere Between Heaven and Hell. They are considered one of the best-selling punk rock bands, with more than three million albums sold worldwide. Social Distortion is currently working on a new album, tentatively due for release in 2019

All Tracks mp3 320ak

Tracklist

01. So Far Away (Maurer,Ness)
02. Let It Be Me.
03. Story of My Life.
04. Sick Boys.
05. Ring of Fire.
06. Ball and Chain.
07. It Coulda Been Me.
08. Shes a Knockout.
09. A Place in My Heart
10. Drug Train.



All of Social Distortion's songs are written and sung by Mike Ness.
(unless otherwise noted.)
There is a common theme in most of his lyrics about impulsiveness, its consequences and the hard struggle to overcome.

Players

 The band currently consists of Mike Ness (lead vocals, lead guitar), Jonny Wickersham (rhythm guitar, backing vocals), Brent Harding (bass, backing vocals), David Hidalgo Jr. (drums), and David Kalish (keyboards)
